             var user = localStorage.getItem('u');\n                if (user) {\n                    userId = JSON.parse(user).UserId;\n                }\n            }\n        } catch (error) {\n            // intentional no-op. If we don't have a userId, that's ok.\n        }\n\n        if (userId > 0) {\n            ga('create', 'UA-63033030-1', { 'userId': userId });\n        } else {\n            ga('create', 'UA-63033030-1', 'auto');\n        }\n\n        ga('send', 'pageview');\n\n    </script>\n    <!-- Used to Test Google Analytics in Dev -->\n\n\n\n</body>"}
